document.full_text: north korea and iran appear to have been regularly exchanging ballistic missile technology in violation of u.n. sanctions, according to a confidential u.n. report obtained by reuters on saturday.
document.title: north korea, iran trade missile technology: u.n.
lines_and_colors: north korea and iran appear to have been regularly exchanging ballistic missile technology in violation of u.n. sanctions, according to a confidential u.n. report obtained by reuters on saturday.
